Actions.Name: Add member to list
Actions.Description: Add or update a list member

Actions.Name: Subscribe or unsubscribe list members
Actions.Description: Batch subscribe or unsubscribe list members.

Actions.Name: List campaigns
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves a list of campaigns in an account

Actions.Name: Show list members
Actions.Description: Show all the members of a list

Actions.Name: Get all the lists
Actions.Description: Find all the lists for the current user

Actions.Name: New Campaign [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use New Campaign (V2) instead.
Create a new campaign based on a Campaign Type, Recipients list and Campaign Settings (subject line, title, from_name and reply_to)

Actions.Name: New Campaign (V2)
Actions.Description: Create a new campaign based on a Campaign Type, Recipients list and Campaign Settings (subject line, title, from_name and reply_to) (V2).

Actions.Name: New List
Actions.Description: Create a new list in your MailChimp account

Actions.Name: When a new list is created
Actions.Description: Triggers a workflow when a new list is created

Actions.Name: When a Member has been added to a list
Actions.Description: Triggers a workflow when a new member has been added to a list

Actions.Name: Remove Member from list
Actions.Description: Delete a member from a list.

Actions.Name: Update member information
Actions.Description: Update information for a specific list member.
